content.title: what is traily
content.description:
Since the hype from Pokemon Go in 2016, geoloaction apps have soared in interest.
Local businesses have been trying to get themselves 'on the map' and we have been helping them.

Until now it has felt like a very seperated approach with local businesses asking us to create an app that would allow their customers to participate in a unique trail.

After creating numerous apps we felt there needed to be a unified approach that allowed businesses to create their own branded trails and offer it to their own clients, without the need for creating an individual app everytime.

And so, traily was born.

content.title: No access to Real Time Data
content.description:
A major challenge faced by Tourist Boards is the delay between visits and obtaining metrics.
Often metrics are only available months later.

content.title: tourism metrics
content.description:
Almost 85 percent of tourists use smartphones while abroad.
30 percent of travelers found accommodation via smartphones
72 percent of post-vacation photos end up on social networks
15 percent of leisure travelers download tourism apps prior to their trips
